5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Mas`ud said:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: “Whoever recites the last two Verses of Surat Al-Baqarah at night, that will be sufficient for him.” In his narration (one of the narrators) Hafs said: “`Abdur-Rahman said: ‘I met Abu Mas`ud when he was performing Tawaf, and he narrated this to me.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا يُرْجَى أَنْ يَكْفِيَ مِنْ قِيَامِ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about what it is hoped will suffice for the night Prayer
